Topic.Title: SOLVED: Anyone else unable to use "text adventures" suddenly?

Posts.EditableText:
**EDIT: I figured it out, I think it was just some kind of weird glitch with my browser or something the other day, because it's fine now. Whoops... ^^" ***

I used this site last summer to make a text adventure and I had a lot of fun with it. I decided to make another one recently, but I'm finding that, despite selecting the "text adventure" option when creating a new file, it *always* generates a gamebook. Anyone else experiencing this issue? It's really starting to annoy me lol. I'm curious how long this error has been happening, since it wasn't an issue last time I made a game here.
